Places Directory 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Jump to Sections of this page Accessibility Help Press  alt  +  /  to open this menu Facebook Email or Phone Password Forgot account? Sign Up Browse Places Check out our new and improved places directory. Places allows you to see where your friends are and share your location in the real world. When you use Places, you'll be able to see if any of your friends are currently checked in nearby and connect with them easily. You can check into nearby Places to tell your friends where you are, tag your friends in the Places you visit, and view comments your friends have made about the Places you visit. Use Places to experience connecting with people on Facebook in a completely new way.
